items.name: func comboBox(NSComboBox, completedString: String) -> String?
items.desc: Returns the first item from the pop-up list that starts with the text the user has typed.

items.name: func comboBox(NSComboBox, indexOfItemWithStringValue: String) -> Int
items.desc: Returns the index of the combo box item matching the specified string.

items.name: func comboBox(NSComboBox, objectValueForItemAt: Int) -> Any?
items.desc: Returns the object that corresponds to the item at the specified index in the combo box.

items.name: func numberOfItems(in: NSComboBox) -> Int
items.desc: Returns the number of items that the data source manages for the combo box.
